title: Laal Lihaaf
overview: Kusum is increasingly vexed by her husband's freakish fantasies that has rendered her marriage loveless. But the touch of a man is soon replaced by tender feminine hands that arouses her unthinkably, and also the sparks are felt by Kusum's cousin Suhani. Witness the fate of this unnatural union as Suhani struggles to escape the ghost of 'Laal Lihaaf'!
